function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Conversion of annoyance ratings to percentage of highly annoyed may oversimplify the impact of noise on mental and physical health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact and airborne particles due to close proximity in densely populated living spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through manual extraction of tweets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of misclassification or misinterpretation of noise-related tweets","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to potentially harmful content during manual tweet extraction","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data collection from twitter may include biased samples and may not represent the entire population’s attitudes towards noise","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of attitudes towards noise before and during the lockdown may not account for external factors that influence noise perception","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data collection and analysis rely on social media, which may not capture the attitudes of individuals who do not use social media platforms","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased noise levels during lockdown may lead to an increase in human interaction and activity, contributing to the potential spread of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 due to reduced traffic flow and movement restrictions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global crises triggered by covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"}]}
